content: 7 7 8 8 balls of watg s crazy sexy gauge wool to ensure your knitting has the same 1 sweetheart sweater pattern measurements as the pattern it is a good 1 set of 10mm us15 100cm/40 idea to make a gauge swatch before you circular knitting needles start knitting your project a gauge swatch 1 set of 12mm us17 100cm/40 is a small sample of your knitting where you circular knitting needles count the stitches and row and check them 1 12mm us17 cable needle against the measurements cm/in given 1 sewing needle in the pattern if you get more stitches/ row than the pattern s gauge it means your knitting is tighter if you get fewer stitches/row than the pattern your knitting is looser sometimes it works to knit tighter or looser to compensate 10mm us15 1x1 rib stitch 10 cm/4 = 11 stitches 10 cm/4 = 11 5 row 12mm us17 stocking stitch 10 cm/4 = 7 stitches 10 cm/4 = 10 row 12mm us17 cluster stitch 10 cm/4 = 7 stitches 10 cm/4 = 10 row you can find all techniques on page 19 pssst remember that you must not copy our patterns and sell or even give them away for free in accordance with copyright law 12 #woolandthegang eng how to make your sweetheart sweater your sweater is made in four pieces a back 6 purl 1 row a front and two sleeves it is then sewn together and finished with a rib trim around 7 repeat steps 3 to 6 a further 11 the neck 11 12 12 13 13 times for this pattern you will be working flat 8 repeat steps 3 and 4 a further using circular needles 0 1 0 1 0 1 time s back sizes 1 3 and 5 only 1 using 10mm us15 circular needles cast on 44 48 52 54 58 62 stitches 9 decrease row cast off 4 5 6 stitches using the long-tail cast on technique with 1 stitch already on the right needle knit 3 4 4 stitches wrap 2 starting with a wrong side row work 5 2 stitches knit 2 stitches wrap 2 row in 1x1 rib stitch stitches knit 7 9 11 stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 7 9 11 stitches 3 change to 12mm us17 circular wrap 2 stitches knit 2 stitches wrap needles knit 8 9 10 10 11 12 2 stitches knit 8 10 11 stitches stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 2 40 47 52 stitches stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 7 8 9 10 11 12 stitches wrap 10 decrease row cast off 4 5 6 stitches 2 stitches knit 7 8 9 10 11 12 purl to the end of the row 36 42 46 stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 2 stitches stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 8 9 10 10 11 12 stitches 11 decrease row cast off 5 6 7 stitches with 1 stitch already on the right 4 purl 1 row needle knit
